verbatim_quote: Yes, actually, I have. So prior to talking to you, I, I did my research. I, I checked your background. I also checked the instructions for this session-
summary_of_observation: Participant conducted pre-session research on the interviewer and instructions.

verbatim_quote: ... so everything is clear. It's just that I'm just wondering, how did you choose the participants? Because I checked your calendar, the second person that you'll be meeting is Kislai. [chuckles] So I was like-
summary_of_observation: Participant expressed curiosity about the participant selection criteria and observed another participant on the calendar.

verbatim_quote: Yes, but I'm not really involved in the attrition part because-
summary_of_observation: Participant indicated they are not involved in the attrition aspect of the company.

verbatim_quote: But for my role specifically, I was hired to recruit for the external clients, not for internal.
summary_of_observation: Participant clarified their specific role involves recruiting for external clients, not internal company roles.

verbatim_quote: for recruitment, usually non-HR people will think na we are part of HR, which I don't like.
summary_of_observation: Participant expressed frustration over the common misconception that their recruitment role is part of HR.

verbatim_quote: Kaya nga when I got your message, sabi ko, "Oh, my God, sa akin ba 'to?" Pero I was under the impression na it's a group call, so sabi ko, "Okay, hindi ako 'to."
summary_of_observation: Participant initially questioned if the session invitation was intended for them, assuming it was a group call.

verbatim_quote: 'Cause when I read the instructions, I was like, "Oh, my God, ako lang mag-isa!"
summary_of_observation: Participant expressed surprise upon realizing it was a solo session after reading the instructions.

verbatim_quote: Well, pero ano lang din, uh, just a recommendation. It will, it will help you guys if you'll also talk to the hiring teams. I mean, at the end of the day, like for instance, yung kung sino man head ng bawat department, kasi sila talaga yung involved dito.
summary_of_observation: Participant recommended involving hiring team heads from various departments as they are directly involved in attrition.

verbatim_quote: Well, people ops per se, I think it's just Didie, and Attorney Ryan is, is kind of new, right? I mean, he just started last, last month as an HR person.
summary_of_observation: Participant identified Didie as a key People Operations contact and mentioned Attorney Ryan is a recent HR hire.

verbatim_quote: Pero I think he will help in terms of the, his perspective in terms of being a hiring manager. 'Di ba- Mm-hmm, mm ... kasi head BPO siya. So makakatulong siya sa part na yun.
summary_of_observation: Participant suggested Attorney Ryan's perspective as a BPO head and hiring manager would be beneficial.

verbatim_quote: Pero if I were you, kausapin mo yung mga sales head, kasi sila yung pinakamataas na attrition.
summary_of_observation: Participant advised contacting sales heads due to their department experiencing the highest attrition.
